nodes.bodyText: Can we add the new name in parallel and deprecate this name? We should be careful about changes to the public API and give people at least a release to switch over before removing public methods.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -96,7 +96,7 @@
    * @param executorService an executor service to parallelize tasks to delete manifests and data files
    * @return this for method chaining
    */
-  ExpireSnapshots executeWith(ExecutorService executorService);

nodes.bodyText: Ah I didn't think we hit a release boundary since that addition, sure no problem
